lead_paragraph: Others were wounded in the shooting in the northern Saskatchewan town of La Loche, but the police offered few details.
snippet: Others were wounded in the shooting in the northern Saskatchewan town of La Loche, but the police offered few details.

headline.main: Four Killed in Saskatchewan School Shooting
headline.print_headline: 4 Killed in School Shooting in Remote Canadian Town

abstract: Royal Canadian Mounted Police say four people were killed in school shooting in La Loche, Saskatchewan; suspect has been detained and is in police custody; unknown number of people were injured in shooting.
